ComicInfo.Summary:
The new story continues! Following the climatic events of last issue, Alley continues her journey into the heart of darkness! Shocking revelations await as she plunges into a bizarre battle against occult forces bent on her destruction! Will Alley fight the influence of the malevolent powers that stir within her soul or will she finally succumb and embrace evil?!
*Notes:* Albert Deschesne last name was spelled as Dechesne. Story takes place on August 24th. "Regarding Vampires and Other Strange Things at the Hawkins House" two page text piece and artwork with questions and answers by Matt Hawkins. "Keu Cha & a 40" two page text piece and artwork with questions and answers Keu Cha interviewed by Sonia Im.
ComicInfo.Title: The Martyr, Part 2
